welcomeMessage:
Welcome to GoofCord!
Setup the settings to your liking and restart GoofCord to access Discord.
You can do this with Ctrl+Shift+R or through the tray/dock menu.
Happy chatting!
opt-minimizeToTray-desc: GoofCord stays open even after closing all windows.
opt-startMinimized-desc: GoofCord starts in the background and remains out of your way.
opt-dynamicIcon-desc:
Shows pings/mentions count on GoofCord's icon and its tray. Overwrites the custom icon.
On Linux pings on the taskbar icon only show when Unity launcher or unitylib is used
opt-customIconPath-desc: Select an alternative icon for GoofCord to use. Images with transparency are recommended.
opt-discordUrl-desc: URL that GoofCord will load on launch. Add "canary." or "ptb." before "discord.com" for respective instances.
opt-modNames-desc: What client mods to use. You shouldn't disable Shelter as it is used by many GoofCord features. Do not mix forks of the same mod (e.g. Vencord and Equicord). Client mod I want to use is not listed.
opt-customCssBundle-desc: A raw link to the JS bundle and CSS bundle of a client mod you want to use.
opt-blocklist-desc: A list of URLs to block. Each entry must be separated by a comma.
opt-blockedStrings-desc: If any of specified strings are in the URL, it will be blocked.
opt-allowedStrings-desc: If any of specified strings are in the URL, it will *not* be blocked.
opt-installDefaultShelterPlugins-desc: Adds GoofCord's helper plugins to Shelter on launch. Don't disable unless facing issues.
opt-invidiousEmbeds-desc: Replaces YouTube embeds with Invidious embeds. You can customize the instance from Shelter settings.
opt-encryptionPasswords-desc: Securely stored, encrypted list of passwords that will be used for encryption. A backup in a warm, safe place is recommended. Separate entries with commas.
opt-encryptionCover-desc: A message that a user without the password will see. At least two words or empty.
opt-encryptionMark-desc: A string that will be prepended to each decrypted message so it's easier to know what messages are encrypted.
opt-arrpc-desc: Enables an open source reimplementation of Discord's rich presence called arRPC. A workaround is needed for arRPC to work on Flatpak
opt-launchWithOsBoot-desc: Start GoofCord automatically on system boot. May not work in some Linux environments.
opt-popoutWindowAlwaysOnTop: Pop out window always on top
opt-popoutWindowAlwaysOnTop-desc: Makes voice chat pop out window always stay above other windows.
opt-updateNotification-desc: Get notified about new version releases.
opt-autoscroll-desc: Enables auto-scrolling with middle mouse button.
opt-transparency-desc: Makes the window transparent for use with translucent themes.
opt-cloudHost-desc: DO NOT MESS WITH THIS UNLESS YOU KNOW WHAT YOU'RE DOING
opt-cloudEncryptionKey-desc: Leave empty to not use encryption and not save message encryption passwords on cloud. You can't recover your password if you lose it.
